mainSequence.step: Cornell Faculty Member selects data file for upload
Web Browser Interface initiates file upload process
File Upload Service stores data file in Digital Repository
Database saves file metadata, including uploader info
File Upload Service displays file upload success to Web Browser Interface
File Upload Service provides file ID and upload confirmation to Cornell Faculty Member
Cornell Faculty Member chooses licensing option (CC-By or CC0) in Web Browser Interface
Web Browser Interface sends license choice and file ID to Licensing Service
Licensing Service applies chosen license to file using Digital Rights Management Service
Digital Rights Management Service updates file metadata with license info in Digital Repository
Database updates file record with license metadata
Digital Repository confirms license application to file with Licensing Service
Licensing Service displays license application success to Web Browser Interface
Web Browser Interface confirms license has been set to Cornell Faculty Member
